author: Yaron Yitzhak
title: Online marketplaces are tanking worldwide – except for Amazon
description: Last week, Amazon announced it’ll open 100,000 new roles to “support people relying on Amazon’s service in this stressful time.” The new hires are set to bring the company’s workforce to over 900,000 worldwide. While Amazon is thriving in the coronavirus cris…
